name: Crowing
description:
May the Murder Survive

To save his murder, a humble crow scout is ordered by his king to deliver mysterious scrolls to three dangerous rivals before sunrise.

 

Pietro is approached in the middle of his watch by the king of his murder. Rumor has it that King Bosco is losing his mind… is that why he’s sending a single scout to meet covertly with the leaders of the surrounding flocks? Find out if survival is in the cards as you lead Pietro on a fateful flight beneath the stars…

Fate flies on black wings
  • Battle predators in games of wit and endurance
  • Avoid death at every turn
  • Discover eight endings that will spell safety or doom for your kin
  • Negotiate against dubious leaders
  • Enjoy the fully voiced shrieks and threats of the animal cast.
  • Warning for mild violence

One murder. One month.

This game was made for the 2022 Spooktober VN Game Jam.
